comments: Agrees with A010918 for terms 0 through 11056 but then differs from it.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6,7,-5,-6).
mathematica: CoefficientList[ Series[(8 + 7 x - 7 x^2 - 7 x^3)/(1 - 6 x - 7 x^2 + 5 x^3 + 6 x^4), {x, 0, 18}], x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 16 2008 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: The old definition was a(n) = 3*a(n-1) + a(n-2) - 2*a(n-3), but as R. J. Mathar pointed out, this did not match the entries. I have therefore replaced the definition with a g.f. found by Superseeker. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 16 2008
